name: Ascalonian Tear
description: The crystallized tears of Ascalonians caught in the Foefire.

description: A small idol in the image of Baelfire.

name: Deadly Bloom
description: A rare and beautiful specimen of lethal horticulture.

description: The official seal of Caudecus, Lord of Beetletun.

name: Knowledge Crystal
description: A small data crystal filled with knowledge.

name: Manifesto of the Moletariate
description: A mission statement of dredge freedom.

name: Shard of Zhaitan
description: A small piece of Zhaitan, forever dead.
